answers.answer: Hi,How are you feeling now?Any reflex action requires a stimulus, a sensory pathway, a link with a motor unit, a motor neuron, and finally, a contractile or other effector element. Any breach in this arc results in an absent reflex.Reflexes of legs and feet includes, knee reflex and ankle reflex.Reflex being reported 0 suggest either there is pathology of peripheral femoral nerve or there is a concern with segmental innervations of L3-4.Peripheral nerve pathologies can be due to Diabetes, Prediabetes, vitamin B12 deficiency, dehydration or nerve compression.Concern about segmental innervations could be due to Lower back strain.Venous stasis or local haemotoma is what is indicated by purple color mottling.Hope this helps.Bye.
